Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A/B Typing Kit
CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A Subtyping Kit
CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A/H5 Subtyping Kit
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel kits for qualitative detection and subtyping of influenza A and B viruses using multiplex RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection of influenza virus type A or B RNA and determination of influenza A subtypes including A(H1N1)pdm09, A(H3), and presumptive identification of A(H5) (Asian lineage) in human respiratory specimens and viral culture to aid in surveillance and diagnosis, using FDA-cleared real-time RT-PCR instruments.
